CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 12, 1955, pg. 11, reads: "Fantasy and Fun - Two members of Chi Eta Phi Sorority adjust costumes in preparation for the sorority's Mardi Gras Ball on Feb. 18 at VFW Post 740 (the former Dutch Henrys). Proceeds from the affair will be contributed to the scholarship fund of the nurses sorority. The present recipient of the scholarship enrolled as a student nurse in Shadyside Hospital."
TitMainTitle: Two members of Chi Eta Phi sorority wearing two piece satin dance costumes and crowns, one adjusting veil over face of other, for Mardi Gras ball
